headline.seo: Barack Obama - Op-Ed - My Plan for Iraq

docs.snippet: True justice will not come from reprisals and violence, it will come from reconciliation and a Libya that allows its citizens to determine their own destiny.      PRESIDENT OBAMA,...
docs.lead_paragraph: True justice will not come from reprisals and violence, it will come from reconciliation and a Libya that allows its citizens to determine their own destiny. PRESIDENT OBAMA,

docs.snippet: It's been a long time coming. But tonight, because of what we did on this date, in this election, change has come to America.     BARACK OBAMA, [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: It's been a long time coming. But tonight, because of what we did on this date, in this election, change has come to America. BARACK OBAMA, [A1]

docs.snippet: I found him to be tough, smart, shrewd, very unsentimental, very pragmatic. And on areas where we disagree, like Georgia, I don't anticipate a meeting of the minds anytime soon.     PRESIDENT OBAMA,  on Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin of Russia. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: I found him to be tough, smart, shrewd, very unsentimental, very pragmatic. And on areas where we disagree, like Georgia, I don't anticipate a meeting of the minds anytime soon. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin of Russia. [A10]

docs.snippet: Look, I wish I had the luxury of just dealing with a modest recession or just dealing with health care or just dealing with energy or just dealing with Iraq or just dealing with Afghanistan. I don't have that luxury, and I don't think the American...
docs.lead_paragraph: Look, I wish I had the luxury of just dealing with a modest recession or just dealing with health care or just dealing with energy or just dealing with Iraq or just dealing with Afghanistan. I don't have that luxury, and I don't think the American people do either. PRESIDENT OBAMA. [A1]

docs.snippet: I think it is important for us to send a signal that we are not hellbent on regime change, just for the sake of regime change, but expect changes in behavior.     BARACK OBAMA, saying he would engage in personal diplomacy with Iran if elected pres...
docs.lead_paragraph: I think it is important for us to send a signal that we are not hellbent on regime change, just for the sake of regime change, but expect changes in behavior. BARACK OBAMA, saying he would engage in personal diplomacy with Iran if elected president. [A1]
